description: I wrote about the brand new Nexus mods app before, as it's quite a promising exciting development for the future of modding (especially for Linux and Steam Deck). And now, they want your feedback.
title: Nexus mods want feedback from Linux / Steam Deck users on their new cross-platform app

description: Selaco is easily one of the biggest highlights of the year, with its mixture of over-the-top action and chunk retro visuals. Altered Orbit Studios also just pushed out a big upgrade for it.
title: Magnificent chunky shooter Selaco gets a 'MEGA' update

description: Linux Mint 22 'Wilma' has a first Beta release available for testing, built on top of Ubuntu 24.04 it will be supported until 2029.
title: Linux Mint 22 'Wilma' gets a Beta release

description: Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster is real from CAPCOM and not only is it coming to Steam, it's releasing somewhat soon on September 19th.
title: Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster announced for Steam releasing September

description: While other vendors continually push out new handheld pc models, sticking similar internals into different shell designs and gradually bumping up RAM or the Processor, the Steam Deck just keeps selling like hot tasty cakes.
title: Will anything dethrone the Steam Deck? Probably not

description: With the release of the ELDEN RING Shadow of the Erdtree DLC, it has of course ensured ELDEN RING the top spot in the top Steam Deck games of June 2024.
title: Here's the top Steam Deck games of June 2024, with ELDEN RING unsurprisingly top

description: While there's been a clear drop, the Linux user share on Steam for June 2024 still remains about 2% showing the clear upwards trend overall.
title: Linux remains above 2% on the Steam Survey for June 2024
